Subject: SQL Solution Set has stale data
Description: The SQL Solution Set reports contain stale data from SQL Servers that have either been decommissioned or moved to AWS RDS instances.  I would like to remove all of the SQL tables that contain all of this stale data and start fresh with only the SQL Servers that are active.
Solution_Comment__c:
1. Right-click the custom or Jobs folder and select Create Job.
2. Navigate to the Configure node and select the Queries node.
3. Click the Create Query button.
4. In the General tab, give a name and description that make sense (ie, DropSQLHostData)
5. In the Data Source tab, select SQL from the Data Collectors dropdown menu
6. Click configure to the launch the SQL Data Collector Configuration Wizard
7. On the Category page, select the Utilities > Remove Storage Tables option under the appropriate database type. This option will drop all collected SQL data for SQL Servers.
8. Run job
